input_text:
Job Title: Image Right Developer

Location: San Mateo, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
HTC Global Services wants you. Come build new things with us and advance your career. At HTC Global you'll collaborate with experts. You'll join successful teams contributing to our clients' success. You'll work side by side with our clients and have long-term opportunities to advance your career with the latest emerging technologies.

At HTC Global Services our consultants have access to a comprehensive benefits package. Benefits can include Paid-Time-Off, Paid Holidays, 401K matching, Life and Accidental Death Insurance, Short & Long Term Disability Insurance, and a variety of other perks.

Image Right .NET Developer working with Guidewire

Image Right Developer Must have ImageRight development experience and proven experience working with Guidewire

Primary Skills: Image Right development experience, .NET, & Insurance (P&C) with Guidewire

Looking for a candidate who is passionate about technology, product development and can thrive in a fast-paced environment to serve as a mentor and expert and perform Knoweledge Transfer relative to the support, maintenance and enhancement of ImageRight as it works with Guidewire.

Core Requirements & Responsibilities

Essential job functions included but are not limited to the following:

Work with colleagues and technical resources to define technical solutions that meet business requirements.Participate in the design, development, testing and debugging of an application.Troubleshoot and ensure timely and effective resolutions of any project issues.Participate in code reviews, both of your own code and as a reviewer.Provide feedback and suggestions for process and product improvement.Conducts technical research on new technology for possible new aspects of a product or components needing redesign or updating.Prepare product documentation, support materials, and internal documentation.Will serve as a mentor and be responsible for KT relative to ImageRight and Guidewire.

Knowledge, Skills And Abilities

Ensures quality of code written or reviewed.Adheres to quality/technical team standards.Makes decisions in their area of responsibility that help maintainability, reuse, security and performance.Able to diagnose issues and provide solutions for multiple functional and technical areas within a product.Can independently frame problems and perform relevant research.Curious and avid learners.Communicate clearly to explain and defend design decisions.Self-motivated and excellent problem-solvers.Driven to improve, personally and professionally.Mentor and inspire others to raise the bar for everyone around them.Collaborate with their peers, designing pragmatic solutions.Operate best in a fast-paced, flexible work environment.Prepare technical training and information sessions for other staff.

Qualifications

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science (or related technical field) or equivalent practical experience.Design and architecture knowledge.Experience with Agile software development.Have an intense passion for innovating and crafting clean code.Experience with .NETExperience with VBScript or similar.Experience with relational databases including SQL.Experience with insurance industry workflow.Are in-tune with high performance and high availability design/programming.Have experience in security best practices for software and data platforms.Enjoy solving problems through the entire application stack.Are interested and capable of learning other programming languages as needed.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
